column10: 1931 to ralph r. and mary hazel (lanning) dodds. her parents precede her in death. julia graduated from montpelier high school in 1949. she married glen e. schwartzkopf on december 21
column12: indiana. julia grew up in millgrove and moved to illinois in 1955. she was a homemaker. she will be sadly missed by her son gary s. (wife
